relevant_findings.HEENT: No scleral icterus, no palpable LAD
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, nondistended, appropriate incisional tenderness, JP drain in RUQ with minimal light serosanguinous output, no rebound/guarding, no palpable masses
relevant_findings.extremities: WWP bilaterally, no c/c/e, no ulcerations
relevant_findings.neurological: Moves all limbs spontaneously, no focal deficits
